definition[0]: good enough to be used for a particular purpose or to be considered satisfactory
example[0]: Students who achieve an acceptable standard will progress to degree studies.
example[1]: How do we reach an acceptable level of data security?
example[2]: an agreement which is acceptable to all sides
definition[1]: acceptable behaviour is considered to be morally or socially good enough
example[3]: Alcohol is not an acceptable way out of your problems.
example[4]: Here, the students set the standards for acceptable behaviour.
example[5]: It is not socially acceptable for parents to leave children unattended at that age.
example[6]: It is perfectly acceptable to sample the food before you buy.
